TEXT.TITLE: COMEX ALUMINUM FUTURES SETTLE UNCHANGED
TEXT.BODY: Comex aluminum futures settled unchanged after featureless session. The May contract settled at 61.50 cents a lb after posting only a five point range. Estimated volume was 40 lots. Reuter
